articles.title: First Friday Labor of Year Done
articles.content:
First Friday Labor of Year Done
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Government employees of ministries and national institutions did the first Friday labor of the year at the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm in Samsok District, Pyongyang.
					 After collecting at least 1,800 tons of compost they were busy carrying it and digging holes in the same spirit as displayed to register successes from the very start of their new year campaign.
					
					 They successfully carried out their daily assignments, foreseeing a bumper harvest on the farm, while the female brass band of the Ministry of People's Security conducted dynamic agitation, making the spirit of bringing about miracles and innovations run high on the fields of the farm.

articles.title: Poems and Words of Songs Created
articles.content:
Poems and Words of Songs Created
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Poets of the Central Committee of the Writers Union of Korea created many poems and words of songs encouraging the army and people of the DPRK in the advance for a great surge.
					"May the powerful country leap higher!" and other poems truthfully represent the firm faith and will of the army and people to successfully realize the noble intention of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is making an endless indefatigable forced march for the prosperity of the country and the people's happiness.
					
					 Among those poems are poems "Bumper harvest visits fields in October" and "Smelter's heart is seething with enthusiasm like molten iron." They earnestly call for accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again in response to the joint New Year editorial to bring about a radical turn in the people's standard of living, push back the frontiers of science and technology in all sectors of the national economy including the four vanguard sectors and set new standards and records.
					
					 Poets also created words of songs including "The world, look at DPRK", "From victory to greater victory", "Every happiness in full bloom under socialism" and "Smelter's optimism".

articles.title: Weavers Turn Out in General Offensive
articles.content:
Weavers Turn Out in General Offensive
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The girls of the Pyongyang Textile Mill have hit their daily quotas from the beginning of the year in response to the joint New Year editorial, carried by the leading newspapers of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, calling for ensuring that the achievements of the great upsurge are followed by greater ones and this year becomes a prosperous year filled with the people's happiness.
					 They, called "girls riding on galloping steeds", are striving hard to reach a new goal and a new standard, helping and leading each other forward.
					
					 When nimbly moving up and down between weaving machines, they just look like dancers on the stage.
					
					 Among them are girls who had fulfilled their plan for two years in the first eight months last year, and young weavers who have joined the multi-spindle and multi-machine tending campaigns, following the examples shown by the elders.
					
					 The textile mill, which has produced lots of winners of the Labor Hero title, has made a great contribution to the economic development and the improvement of the people's living.
					
					 In recent years it has radically changed its appearance and laid solid foundations to sharply boost production by updating all the production processes to meet the requirements of the IT age in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.
					
					 It is the weaving girls' firm determination to stand in the van of this year's general offensive for improving the people's living standard considerably.

articles.title: Refurnished Restaurants in Changgwang Street
articles.content:
Refurnished Restaurants in Changgwang Street
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The restaurants in Changgwang Street in the heart of Pyongyang have been refurnished splendidly to grade up with the Songun era.
					 They, standing in rows on both sides of the street, have been recoated with encaustic tiles, while keeping their original architectural style. Their front yards and sideways have also been paved with square colored blocks, adding beauty to the street.
					
					 The Sagyejol (four seasons) Restaurant has been facelifted in such a way as making customers enjoy dishes in different seasonal mood in each room. Also taking on a new look is the Unjong Teahouse serving various kinds of soft drinks including famous Kangryong green tea and black tea.
					
					 Wonderful is the central hall of the Porter House with a pipe connected directly with a black beer producer.
					
					 The walls and columns of other restaurants serving soft bean curd, entrails and tangogi food, noodle and pancakes have been wainscoted with tiles, metal and stone decorations and other quality coasting materials suitable to shapes of the buildings.
					
					 Kitchens are now equipped with modern cooking facilities to prepare various dishes as quickly as possible.
					
					 In the evening light devices controlled by computers emit colorful and bright light automatically and electric decorative lights installed in the exterior of the restaurants produce a harmonious light effect, providing a fascinating night view to the street.
					
					 The refreshed look of Changgwang Street lined up with restaurants, associated with deep concern of the Workers' Party of Korea for the development of national dishes for the people, is one of what Pyongyang is boasting.

articles.title: Historic Relics in Mt. Myohyang
articles.content:
Historic Relics in Mt. Myohyang
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Mt. Myohyang, one of the six famous mountains in Korea, abounds with historic relics.
					 Among the relics are three large gates, namely Jogye, Haethal and Chonwang, leading to the main hall of the Pohyon Temple.
					
					 Jogye Gate, built in the last period of Koryo (918-1392) and rebuilt in 1644, is 7.3 meters wide in facade and 3.8 meters wide in flank, with a gateway in the middle.
					
					 Standing on both sides of the gateway are gate-keepers of the temple, idols called Kumgang God.
					
					 After the gate, there is a road flanked with several stone monuments telling the history of the temple.
					
					 Haethal Gate was built in the late Koryo period and reconstructed in 1644.
					
					 It, larger than Jogye Gate, is 9.2 meters wide in facade and 5.6 meters wide in flank. It also has a gateway in the middle.
					
					 Seen on both sides of the gateway are idols riding on a lion and an elephant.
					
					 Erected in 1042, Chonwang Gate is 14.17 meters wide in facade and 9.4 meters wide in flank, with a gateway in the middle part.
					
					 There are idols of four heavenly kings defending the Buddhist world on the right and left sides of the gateway.
					
					 The relics reflecting the wisdom and talent of the Korean nation have been preserved well as priceless cultural assets of the country.

articles.title: U.S. Bellicose Forces' Scenario to Stifle DPRK Assailed
articles.content:
U.S. Bellicose Forces' Scenario to Stifle DPRK Assailed 
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is pushing ahead in real earnest with the production and deployment of bunker busters for actual use while getting frantic with the development of new type strategic bombers equipped with Stealth technology and nuclear warheads. 
					   Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: This is a revelation of the U.S. scenario for mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK and very dangerous military hysteria aimed at seriously threatening and disturbing world peace and stability.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 This development is touching off a serious caution among the Korean people. 
					
					 The alarming arms buildup of the U.S. bellicose forces is a product of their extreme hostility towards the DPRK and a vivid manifestation of their scenario for starting the second Korean war.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to stifle the DPRK through a preemptive nuclear attack after deploying reinforced modern offensive means in south Korea and its vicinity.
					
					 It is quite natural for the DPRK to have in place every necessary means for protecting the sovereignty, security and peace of the country and the nation in order to cope with the grave moves of the U.S. warlike forces for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is committing strategic mistakes, overconfident of its strength. It is very foolish and ridiculous for the U.S. to try to do harm to the DPRK, counting on such "advantage" of military technical means as bunker buster.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Without improvement of inter-Korean relations, it would be impossible to expect the national reconciliation, unity and cooperation, hope for peace of the country and security of the nation and successfully solve any problem related to the national reunification in conformity with the nation's will and interests.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					 To definitely turn the present north-south relations of distrust and confrontation into the relationship of trust and reconciliation is the best way for preventing the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula and realizing the national independent reunification by the concerted efforts of the entire nation, it says, and goes on:
					
					 What is important in opening up the road for improvement of the north-south relations is to thoroughly convert these relations into the relationship based on the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The north-south relations, the relationship between the fellow countrymen, should be reunification-oriented relations to realize the re-connection of territory and reunion of the nation artificially divided by foreign forces.
					
					  "By our nation itself" is not a specified slogan of somebody but an idea common to the nation for the improvement of the north-south relations and the national reunification, agreed upon and announced to the world by the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 Denial of this idea is just opposition to the improvement of inter-Korean relations and the national reunification.
					
					 Such behaviors as drawing foreign forces into the issue of inter-Korean relations and setting the nuclear issue as the precondition for development of these relations should never be tolerated as they are, in essence, intended to push the relations to irrevocable catastrophic crisis.
					
					 In order to open up the road for improved inter-Korean relations, it is necessary to respect the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, great programmes for independent reunification of the nation, and honestly implement them.
					
					 It is preposterous to talk about "dialogue" and "cooperation" while denying the inter-Korean declarations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to stop the acts of escalating confrontation and tension and come out to the road for the north-south dialogue and the improvement of their relations, respecting the said declarations.
					
					 The destiny of the cause of independent reunification depends on opening up the road for improved north-south relations.

articles.title: DPRK Joint New Year Editorial Hailed
articles.content:
DPRK Joint New Year Editorial Hailed
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of India (Marxist) and personages of India and Norway issued statements in support of the joint New Year editorial published by the newspapers of the party, the army and the youth of the DPRK.
					 The Communist Party of India (Marxist) in its statement on Jan. 2 said: The Party Central Committee is convinced that the Korean people will achieve greater successes in the work to carry through the tasks set forth in the joint editorial for this year and improve the people's standard of living.
					
					 The hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. should be terminated and a durable peacekeeping system established on the Korean Peninsula through dialogue and negotiation in order to ensure peace and stability of the peninsula and the region, it stressed. 
					
					 The secretary of the Indian National Congress in a statement on Jan. 1 wished the Korean people success in their efforts to realize the independent and peaceful reunification of the country on the basis of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, in his statement on Jan. 2 confirmed invariable support and solidarity with the efforts of the DPRK government, hoping that it would bring about an epochal turn in radically improving the people's standard of living and register big success in the efforts to realize the great unity of the Korean nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country this year.

articles.title: Creadas en Corea nuevas poesias y letras de cancion
articles.content:
Creadas en Corea nuevas poesias y letras de cancion
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ATCC) -- Los poetas del Comite Central de la Union de Escritores de Corea crearon numerosas poesias y letras de cancion que estimulan al ejercito y el pueblo de Corea a la marcha por el gran auge.
					La poesia "!Vuela mas alto, la patria poderosa!" y otras describieron de modo veridico la firme fe y la voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de realizar con exito el noble proposito del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien emprende sin descansos la marcha forzada por la prosperidad del pais y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					La poesia "Se agitan las espigas abundantes de cereales de octubre", "El corazon del fundidor se refleja en el rojo hierro colado" y otras llaman a imprimir un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo dando otro acicate a la industria ligera y la agricultura en acato al editorial conjunto de los periodicos Rodong Sinmun, Joson Inmingun y Chongnyon Jonwi publicado por el ano nuevo y a crear nuevas normas y records conquistando la cumbre tecnologica en todos los dominios de la economia nacional incluidos los 4 sectores de avanzada.
					
					Los poetas crearon tambien las letras de cancion como "Mira a Corea, el mundo", "De victoria a la victoria mayor", "Llegan todas las felicidades del socialismo", "El fundidor romantico", etc.

articles.title: Muchachas participantes en marcha general
articles.content:
Muchachas participantes en marcha general
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ATCC) -- Las muchachas de la Fabrica Textil de Pyongyang sobrecumplen sus planes diarios tambien en el ano en curso en pleno acato al editorial conjunto de los organos del partido, el ejercito y la juventud que exhorta a extender la victoria del gran auge y convertir este ano en un ano de prosperidad que traiga la felicidad para el pueblo.
					  Ellas corren con mas rapidez ayudandose hacia nueva meta, nueva norma que superan records ya logrados.
					
					   Los aspectos de las tejedoras, quienes van y vienen entre las nuevas maquinas de tejer como si bailaran, hacen recordar a las lindas bailadoras de la escena del teatro.
					
					  Entre ellas figuran las innovadoras laborales que cumplieron planes de la economia nacional para los dos anos hasta agosto del ano pasado y las innovadoras muchachas de tierna edad que participan en el movimiento por manejar muchas maquinas y muchos husos siguiendo a las primeras.
					
					  La citada fabrica, de donde salieron muchas Heroinas del Trabajo de siglo en siglo, contribuye grandemente al desarrollo economico del pais y la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					  En los ultimos anos la fabrica acondiciono nuevamente todos los procesos de la produccion conforme a la demanda de la epoca de IT poniendo de pleno manifiesto el espiritu revolucionario de la autoconfianza y dejo abierta la firme perspectiva capaz de aumentar vertiginosamente la produccion.
					
					  Hoy en dia, la bella suena de las muchachas de la fabrica es hacerse vanguardia en la ofensiva general para imprimir el cambio decisivo en el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia intento de ataque preventivo nuclear de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia intento de ataque preventivo nuclear de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ATCC) -- Ahora Estados Unidos impulsa en etapa crucial la produccion y el emplazamiento de las bombas supergrandes para batir los objetos subterraneos y se entrega con frenesi al desarrollo de un nuevo cazabombardero estrategico dotado de la tecnologia Stealth y ojivas nucleares.
					Esto es una expresion de la intencion del imperio de atacar preventivamente a la RPDC, siendo una peligrosa locura militar que amenaza y perturba gravemente la paz y la estabilidad del mundo.
					
					En un comentario individual difundido este viernes al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun insiste en que tales maniobras provocan gran precaucion del pueblo coreano, y prosigue:
					
					El sospechoso aumento armamentista a que recurren freneticamente los belicistas estadounidenses es producto de su extremada conciencia hostil a la RPDC y expresion coherente de su siniestro intento de desatar la segunda guerra coreana. 
					
					  EE.UU. intenta aumentar los medios ofensivos modernos en el Sur de Corea y su contorno con el fin de aplastar a la RPDC a modo de ataque preventivo nuclear. 
					
					  Es natural que la RPDC dispusiera de todos los medios necesarios para defender la soberania, la seguridad y la paz del pais y la nacion frente a esas graves maniobras belicistas en su contra.
					
					  La demasiada confianza de EE.UU. en sus fuerzas lo lleva a cometer errores estrategicos.
					
					  Es vano y ridiculo que EE.UU. pretendiera aplastar a la RPDC valiendose de la "supremacia" de medios tecnicos militares como las mencionadas bombas supergrandes.

articles.title: Renovada la figura de avenida de restaurantes Changgwang
articles.content:
Renovada la figura de avenida de restaurantes Changgwang
 Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ATCC) -- Quedo reconstruida magnificamente conforme a la demanda de la era del Songun la avenida de restaurantes Changgwang situada en el corazon de esta capital.
					  Fueron engalanadas con nuevos azulejos de diversos colores las paredes de todos los restaurantes que conservan su estilo arquitectonico original y estan alineados en ambos lados de esa avenida ancha.
					
					  En tanto, las aceras resultaron ataviadas con azulejos de color bien cuadrados mejorando el perfil de la avenida.
					
					  En el Restaurante Sagyejol, el cliente sera envuelto en las atmosferas de primavera, verano, otono e invierno en cada uno de sus cuartos acondicionados acorde a las peculiaridades de las 4 estaciones del ano.
					
					  La remodelada Casa de Te Unjong ofrece varios refrescos como el famoso te verde y el rojo de Kangryong.
					
					  Es particular, se ve original el hall central de la Casa de Cerveza Negra donde esta bebida se ofrece mediante el tubo conectado directamente con la base que la produce.
					
					  Las paredes y pilares de todos los restaurantes como el de Sundubu (requeson de soja no prensado), el de la Sopa de Visceras, el de Tangogi, el de Fideos Changgwangsan y el de Tortillas fueron adornados hermosamente conforme a las peculiaridades de los edificios con los materiales finos de construccion como los azulejos generales y los metalicos, las piedras y la pintura para la parte exterior.
					
					De esta manera, estos edificios se han remozado perfectamente en sentido plastico y artistico.
					
					  Los equipos ultramodernos instalados en las cocinas permiten preparar instantaneamente varios platos que pidan los clientes.
					
					  La avenida Changgwang luce mas maravillosa por la noche gracias a los adornos electricos que esparcen automaticamente los rayos en colores de arco iris segun lo programado por el ordenador y a los efectos armoniosos de los luminicos electricos colocados en la parte exterior de los restaurantes.
					
					  Deviene un orgullo de Pyongyang esta avenida renovada en que se palpa el calido amor por el pueblo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que se propone asegurar a los habitantes una vida mas feliz al desarrollar activamente los platos nacionales.
